name: stock_symbols
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool real_time_quotes.
Tool description: Real-time and historical data of stocks, cryptocurrencies and forex based on multiple data sources such as Yahoo Finance
API description: Fetches and returns a list of all available stock symbols from the real-time-quotes API.

includenames.description: If True, includes stock names in the returned data. Defaults to None.
